references.paper_title: Learning without mixing: Towards a sharp analysis of linear system identification
references.reason: This paper provides a foundational probabilistic version of persistent excitation, crucial for the main results on non-asymptotic convergence rates.

references.paper_title: Active learning for nonlinear system identification with guarantees
references.reason: This paper presents a crucial counter-example highlighting the insufficiency of non-active exploration for general nonlinear systems, motivating the current work's focus on real-analytic functions.

references.paper_title: Learning the uncertainty sets of linear control systems via set membership: A non-asymptotic analysis
references.reason: This paper provides the foundation for the set membership estimation (SME) analysis in the current work, establishing convergence rates and diameter bounds.

references.paper_title: Non-asymptotic and accurate learning of poolineable dynamical systems
references.reason: This paper establishes convergence rates for bilinear systems under non-active exploration, providing a baseline for extending such results to the broader class of linearly parameterized nonlinear systems.

references.paper_title: Learning nonlinear dynamical systems from a single trajectory
references.reason: This paper provides a relevant comparison to the current work by studying nonlinear system identification with a different parameterization, focusing on neural network-style architectures.
